#summary How to check out this project.

= Introduction =

Tips in order not to checkout the whole project.

= SVN =

See
[http://code.google.com/p/alban/source/checkout Source]

{{{
svn co svn:https://alban.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ --depth empty
}}}

= Ubuntu =

== Prepare workspace == 

{{{
cd /
mkdir -p /workspace/users/albandri
sudo chown albandri.root workspace
sudo apt-get install xxdiff nis ntp autofs tcsh libssl log4cxx curl
sudo apt-get autoremove
}}}

== Install Maven 3 == 

[http://yarovoy.com/post/14363197336/maven-how-to-install-maven-3-on-ubuntu-11-10 maven-3-install]
